ch0289_10_nemo/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Oooh, so lucky
that I ran into you!
ch0289_10_nemo/0101_0701_02_10:
I was just looking for a friend to battle with!
So let’s get going!
ch0289_10_nemo/7101_0701_01_10: Finally, I get to battle in my sygna suit!
ch0289_10_nemo/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been super jealous for a while now of
everyone who gets to wear one!
ch0289_10_nemo/7101_0701_04_10:
I can tell my stay on Pasio is about to get even
more awesome!
ch0289_10_nemo/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that Scream Tail is actually from ancient
times.
ch0289_10_nemo/7102_0701_02_10: It’s still hard to believe, though...
ch0289_10_nemo/7102_0701_03_10:
I mean, how amazing is it that we get to battle
with Pokémon from a different time? I feel
so lucky!
ch0289_10_nemo/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m feeling brand-new in my sygna suit! Now my
bond with my partner Pokémon will get
even stronger.
ch0289_10_nemo/7103_0701_02_10:
I gotta make sure I can keep up with my partner,
though.
ch0289_10_nemo/7104_0701_01_10:
If you see a Pokémon that looks like one we’re
familiar with, but it’s a little more rampagey
than average...
ch0289_10_nemo/7104_0701_02_10: then it might be a Pokémon from a different time!
ch0289_10_nemo/7104_0701_03_10:
Let me know if you ever see one in the wild...
It might be an emergency!
ch0289_10_nemo/7104_0701_04_10:
But Pasio doesn’t have any wild Pokémon, right?
So we should be OK.
ch0289_10_nemo/7105_0701_01_10:
Your skills sure are ripening,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m sure we’ll have a
fantastic battle someday!
ch0289_10_nemo/7105_0701_02_10:
My intuition never lets me down! You’re gonna
become my rival one day!
ch0289_10_nemo/1701_0701_01_10:
Ta-ta-tachán! Here’s a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0289_10_nemo/1701_0701_02_10: Hope you get even stronger by using items!
ch0289_10_nemo/1701_0702_01_10: Let’s keep having TONS of Pokémon battles!
ch0289_10_nemo/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve seen Pokémon from another time in
Paldea, too.
ch0289_10_nemo/2501_0701_02_10:
Ohmygosh, when I saw one for the first time, I
couldn’t stop shaking!
ch0289_10_nemo/2501_0701_03_10: I just HAD to find out how strong it was, y’know?!
ch0289_10_nemo/2501_0702_01_10:
Maybe one day you’ll meet a Pokémon you don’t
expect, like I did!
ch0289_10_nemo/2501_0702_02_10:
And if it becomes your partner Pokémon, I’ll be the
first to battle you!
ch0289_10_nemo/2511_0701_01_10:
At our school in Paldea, we did a special
independent study thing where we searched for
our own treasure.
ch0289_10_nemo/2511_0701_02_10: Wanna give it a try on Pasio, too?
ch0289_10_nemo/2511_0701_03_10:
An adventure where bright memories await...
It’s sure to be so much fun!
ch0289_10_nemo/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe a treasure hunt wouldn’t be all that
different from what you’ve been doing already...
ch0289_10_nemo/2511_0702_02_10:
but it could be a chance for you to take a close
look at what’s most important to you!
ch0289_10_nemo/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s hard not to feel sleepy in the morning... How
’bout a Pokémon battle to wake us up?
ch0289_10_nemo/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten lunch yet? You can’t battle well
with a growling tummy, right?
ch0289_10_nemo/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re not too tired, mind if I ask you for one
last Pokémon battle today?
